languages.text: Вас обвинили в одержимости варп-сущностью и принудили к изгнанию, что оставило после себя шрамы на вашей душе.
You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.
languages.original_text: Вас обвинили в одержимости варп-сущностью и принудили к изгнанию, что оставило после себя шрамы на вашей душе.

traits.locale_text: A warp entity possessed your body for a brief time, leaving your soul forever scarred afterward.
A warp entity possessed your body for a brief time, leaving your soul forever scarred afterward.
You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.

You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.

languages.text: Vous avez été {mf|accusé|accusée} d'être {mf|possédé|possédée} par une entité du Warp et {mf|contraint|contrainte} à l'exil, l'âme à jamais meurtrie.
languages.original_text: You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez été {mf|accusé|accusée} d'être {mf|possédé|possédée} par une entité du Warp et {mf|contraint|contrainte} à l'exil, l'âme à jamais meurtrie.

languages.text: Te acusaron de haber sido poseíd{mf|o|a} por un ser de disformidad y te exiliaron, dejando cicatrices permanentes en tu alma.
languages.original_text: You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.

traits.locale_text: Una entidad de la disformidad poseyó tu cuerpo durante unos momentos, lo que dejó unas cicatrices indelebles en tu interior.

languages.text: あなたは<歪み>の実体に憑依されていると告発されて追放され、魂に永遠の傷を負った。
languages.original_text: You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>の存在があなたの肉体に短時間憑依した。そして、あなたの魂には永遠の傷が残された。

languages.text: 你遭到了指控，说你被亚空间怪物附体。你不得不因此踏上流亡之路，灵魂中留下了无法磨灭的伤痕。
languages.original_text: You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.

traits.locale_text: 某个亚空间实体曾短暂地附在你的身上，但却在你的灵魂中留下了永久的伤痕。

languages.text: Du wurdest beschuldigt, von einer Warp-Wesenheit besessen zu sein, und ins Exil verbannt. Deine Seele ist auf ewig gezeichnet.
languages.original_text: You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.

traits.locale_text: Eine Warp-Wesenheit hat kurzzeitig von deinem Körper Besitz ergriffen, wodurch deine Seele immerwährende Narben davongetragen hat.

languages.text: Bir öteboyut varlığınca ele geçirilmekle suçlanıp sürgün edildin. Bu durum ruhunda asla kapanmayacak yaralar bıraktı.
languages.original_text: You were accused of being possessed by a warp entity and forced into exile, leaving your soul forever scarred.
